subject: United States Open (Golf)
Father's Day
Golf
lead_paragraph: Keegan Bradley’s father carried his bag as they walked up the 18th hole, which brought back memories for Michael Allen, 53, the oldest player in the United States Open field.
snippet: Keegan Bradley’s father carried his bag as they walked up the 18th hole, which brought back memories for Michael Allen, 53, the oldest player in the United States Open field.
